General.Name: Hubei Xinyangfeng Fertilizer Co Ltd
General.Description: YONFER Agricultural Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, production, and marketing of fertilizers in China. The company provides phosphate and compound fertilizers, slow and controlled release fertilizers, and water-soluble fertilizers; new energy materials; fine chemicals; and phosphogypsum building materials. It also offers agrochemical services. The company also exports its products. It sells its products under the Yangfeng, Aotel, Lisino, and Lekaihuai brand names. The company was formerly known as Xinyangfeng Agricultural Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to YONFER Agricultural Technology Co., Ltd. in April 2023. YONFER Agricultural Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jingmen, China.
General.Address: No. 7 Attached to Moon Lake North Road, Jingmen, China, 448000
